ValidationRule.description: BIZ-46933: Validation to prevent user from changing Subsidiary or Bank Account once the Payment has been Posted.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL( blng__Status__c , "Posted") && (ISCHANGED(Subsidiary__c) || ISCHANGED (Bank_Account__c)||ISCHANGED( USD_Amount__c ) || ISCHANGED ( Exchange_Rate__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cannot update the record once the Payment is Posted
